snippet: The decision by President François Hollande indicates that Western governments are becoming more assertive in confronting Russia over Ukraine.

byline.original: By MAÏA de la BAUME and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The decision by President François Hollande indicates that Western governments are becoming more assertive in confronting Russia over Ukraine.

headline.main: France Postpones Delivery of Warship to Russia
headline.print_headline: France Postpones Delivery of Warship to Russia
